main event: On 6 December 1952, pilots on a training flight observed unidentified objects over McGuire AFB, New Jersey.
interesting points: The observed objects were described as round lights of varying intensity, changing from white to red and amber., No sound or exhaust was associated with the objects that were noted for 15 minutes., Radar observations indicated small bright blips moving rapidly at speeds exceeding 9000 mph., Multiple witness accounts confirmed the visual sightings of the objects with similar descriptions., Analysis concluded the objects may have been balloons or aircraft.
witness description: pilots and radar operators involved in the training mission
